thread.title: Trump Lawyer Michael Cohen Described as a ‘3 a.m. Break-the-Glass Call’

author: wsjcom
title: Trump Lawyer Michael Cohen Described as a ‘3 a.m. Break-the-Glass Call’
text:
Michael D. Cohen cut his teeth as a lawyer handling small-time car-accident cases inside a taxi garage in Queens, N.Y.
Now, as Donald Trump’s personal attorney, he finds himself on a much bigger legal stage—with the headlights squarely on him.
FBI agents on Monday raided Mr. Cohen’s office, home and Manhattan hotel room, seizing records related... RELATED VIDEO Trump Calls Cohen Raids a 'Witch Hunt' On Monday President Trump called the raids at the office of his lawyer, Michael Cohen, a "disgrace" and a "witch hunt" and discussed the possibility of firing special counsel Robert Mueller. Photo: Getty.
